lead_paragraph: Impeached South Korean President Park Geun-hye vehemently rejected accusations Sunday that she conspired with a longtime friend to extort money and favors from companies, accusing her opponents of framing her.
snippet: Impeached South Korean President Park Geun-hye vehemently rejected accusations Sunday that she conspired with a longtime friend to extort money and favors from companies, accusing her opponents of framing her....

headline.main: Impeached S. Korean Leader Rejects Accusations Against Her
headline.print_headline: Impeached S. Korean Leader Rejects Accusations Against Her
